content: Hey -- it looks like https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/83167#issuecomment-881061634 didn't receive much uptake in terms of actual implementation work. Do we think it makes sense to file a dedicated issue? I don't think we'd be backporting this to beta/stable to try and get it into 1.54 (shipping in less than a week), but if we could get something on nightly by next Thursday that'd be already nice -- we can easily link to nightly docs from the release blog post, for example.
